rules_text:
Trample
Whenever you cycle Long-Term Method Actor or it attacks, proliferate. [i](Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)[/i]
Basic landcycling {1}{G} [i]({1}{G}, Discard this card: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.)[/i]
